title: The Pool Party Event Reached the First Reward
body:
Spontaneously jumping from 50% of level 1 to 25% of level 2. Seems perfectly legit.

But hey, now you get more IP (but only for 5 man groups because fuck everyone else) to grind for absurdly expensive characters.

Next up, grind/spend your way to getting discounts. That's right, you get spend money for the privilege of spending less money.

Another blatant cash-grab event by Riot. Brilliant.
